name: Fly and don't crash
description:
!!! If there is a white screen, just refresh the page !!!

 - SPACE to start

- LEFT/RIGHT to move

If you touch one block, the game will restart. 
The game was made in less than 3h with an own made 3D game engine, blender and Aseprite.

See https://github.com/dwursteisen/mini-gdx to get more information about the engine. (Build with Kotlin Multiplatform)
